inn1.comm: starts off with a length ball, around off, no swing, defended with an open face
middle and leg, and Smith shuffles a bit to get inside the line, and clips it past square leg, enough time for him to get three
yorker around middle and off, Amla digs it out
back of a length, punched away to cover
left alone, brave leave, it was pitched back of a length, and it was wide and high by mere inches. In fact Hawkeye says it missed the top of off by a couple of centimetres
fuller, driven to wide of mid-off, comes through for one
short and wide, cut away, over point, comes back for two
drives with an open face, towards point
back of a length, into the pads, punched away to mid-on
punched away, can't beat cover
another punch from on and outside off, gets it past mid-off and takes a single
tucks him up with a shortish delivery, defended to the leg side
another punchy shot from Amla, can't beat cover again
fuller delivery, patted back to the bowler
punched away wide of cover, doesn't make great connection, gets only a couple
full ball, check-drives it straight to mid-off
angled into the pads, misses out, but gets a leg-bye
sharp running, dabbed towards slip, goes just wide of the fielder and they scamper through for a single
full, angled across him, pushed to point
another full delivery, driven on the up, straight to mid-off
short, dragged from outside off towards mid-on
slightly fuller but not driving length, Smith defends it back to the bowler
gets across the stumps and drops and runs, right at his feet
short ball, hurried into the pull shot, gets a top edge that just about clears the square leg inside the circle
short, angled across him, drags it towards the leg side
nicely played, creates his line here. Smith knows the fine leg is up, shuffles across towards off, gets inside the line of a middle-line delivery, and flicks it past short fine leg
Taylor goes outside off again, punched away to cover
stays a touch low outside off, hit to mid-on
cut away, one bounce to Pollard at backward point
length ball outside off, defended with an open face
length ball, around off, gets the inside half of the bat towards mid-on
half-volley, outside off, Amla shuffles across and wrists it straight down the ground. Ramapul gets a hand to it, but it is still good enough to go the boundary
short, wide, throws his bat at it, gets an edge, and there is no slip - would have gone over the fieldsman anyway
slight movement in, Amla works it past gully towards third man for one
misfield by Pollard at backward point, lets the cut shot yield a single. He has hurt a finger on his right hand, too
short, wide, cut away to third man for one
angling into the pads, and nicely worked away wristily passed mid-on
into the pads again, this time it is hit straight to deep square leg for one
defended off the back foot, just outside off
beaten outside off, Smith pushing inside the line of a delivery angled across him
slight hint of desperation, charges down at him, and somehow manages to cut it between cover-point and cover, gets a couple
late-cut, and they get a single despite a diving save from Pollard
chips down the track again, more convincing shot this time, slashed away through the covers. Gets two again
effort ball, a little bit of extra bounce, Smith aborts the powerful cut and then guides it towards third man
short outside off, steered to third man for one
shuffles way across towards off stump, and works this length ball square on the on side, and comes back for two
fuller, outside off, some movement away from Smith, beating him
length ball outside off, early into the shot, bottom hand comes as he hits it on the bounce to short cover
and he teases the short cover, punching this on the up, wide of the short cover, from just outside off, lovely shot
slower ball, shuffles across, and whips it towards mid-on, and takes a single
chips down the track, gets a slower ball and defends it back to the bowler
almost got his man, another slower ball, Smith checks the shot, and it falls inches short of the short midwicket
comes down the track, Bravo bowls the slower ball again, driven wide of mid-off for one
angled into the pads, worked away for an easy single
back of a length, outside off, played towards point
nicely punched away from outside off, can't find the gap in the covers
closer to the stumps, Amla dead-bats it, and Smith steals a single, good early call and fast running
shuffles across, gets inside the line, and clips it past short fine. Amla wants two, but Nikita Miller is quick and keeps them down to one
beaten outside off as he looks to run it down to third man
lovely punch shot, just back of a length outside off, and he meets it with an open face, and finds the gap between cover-point and cover
full ball, around off, Smith makes room and drives, can't beat point
gives him the charge, Bravo bowls the slower ball, and he clips it off the pads
appeal for lbw as Amla looks to pull, but umpire reckons there is a bottom edge into the pad. replay suggests there was no edge - the ball just kept low. Anyhow it would have sailed over the stumps
short and wide, dabbed away for one
nicely driven straight back down the ground, Bravo gets right hand onto it and saves three runs
comes down the track again, and clips this one towards fine leg
poor fielding by Taylor at third man. This is short and wide, cut away to his left, Taylor over-runs it by half a step, is late in bending down, and doesn't even manage to touch it
comes down the track, works it into the on side for one
length ball around off, defended towards cover
shuffles across, gets inside the line, and flicks it square of fine leg
first wide of the innings, angling too far down the leg side
back of a length, punched away to sweeper-cover for one
angled across, drives at it, gets the inside half of the bat towards mid-off
very slow delivery outside off, played with an open face wide of point for one
backs away, gets a full ball into the pads, and hits it to long-on for one
shuffles away outside off, and flicks it from outside off to wide of midwicket, where Gayle makes a diving save
slower ball, into the pads, inside edge towards midwicket
Smith chips down the track, is beaten by the slower one, gets an inside edge that doesn't carry to the keeper. Bravo is down on his knees in exasperation
more frustration for Bravo. Smith shuffles across, gets a faster one this time, clips it towards short fine in the air, Rampaul dives forward, gets both hands to it, but it doesn't stick in
comes down the track, also shuffles across to cover the spin. Misses it, but pads are the second line of defence
stays in the crease and works this wide of midwicket for one
short, wide, cut away, thanks for coming
straighter delivery, Amla goes back into the crease and works it into the on side
full, Smith looks to force into the on side, hits straight to short midwicket
pushed to long-on for a strolled single
shuffles across again, Bravo bowls full and straight, hit towards square leg
good running, moves across again, and works it square of fine leg to come back for two
and Bravo bowls a bouncer. Double bluff perhaps. Into the ribs. Smith gloves it towards short fine for one
length ball, around off, played with an open face towards third man
pushed square of the wicket, Sammy makes a diving save at cover-point
slower ball, full outside off, hit to mid-off
flat delivery, into the pads, worked away
moves across outside off, helps it away into the on side
fired down the leg side, Amla has nothing to do with it
jumps down the track, pushes this down to long-off for one
dabbed away to point for one
moves way too across, once too often, and leaves the stumps exposed and misses a full and straight delivery. leg stump gone, Miller clenches his fist. Time for drinks
slower ball, outside off, steered away for a single to bring up another fifty for Amla
gets a bouncer first up, and Kallis pulls and is beaten
clipped away off the pads to get off the mark
length ball, driven on the up, finds mid-off
slower ball, wide outside off, driven along the ground to sweeper-cover
stops at him, 79.6mph, Kallis hits uppishly towards mid-on, doesn't carry, and Bravo is down on his knees again
pulls a back-of-a-length delivery to deep square leg
short, wide, cut away, expertly finds the gap between cover and cover-point
into the pads, helped around the corner for one
chips down the track, yorks himself, hits towards cover
leading edge to short midwicket, Sammy dives forward, but it lands inches in front of his fingers
spin for Gayle right away, Amla makes room and guides it into the gap on the off side
back of a length, punched to point
slower ball, played with an open face, can't get it past point
length ball, driven uppishly, almost a check shot, with an open face, past a diving cover, good placement
steered down to third man for one
short ball, into the body, pulled away to fine leg for one
looks to run this down to third man, but it is too close to his body, and ends up defending it
Kallis gets an inside edge as he looks to drive through the covers
length ball, around off, runs it down to third man
shuffles across, gets a short ball into the ribs, and helps it along to fine leg
shuffles across again, and drags this from outside off to long-on for one
beaten outside off as he looks to run this down to third man. Too close to him
repeats the shot, gets bat on it this time, and takes a single to third man
short, outside off, cut away to sweeper-cover
quicker, flatter one, beats Amla on the cut
cuts all right this time, and wide of sweeper-cover too, comes back for two
wristy shot, clipped away to fine leg
into the pads again, helped away for an easy single
charges down the track, drives with an open face, gets a single
shuffles across and hits this from outside off to long-on
outside off, beats him as he looks to run it down the third man
nicely played, shuffles across again, Sammy bowls wide outside off, and he then opens the face past wide slip for one
full and wide, Amla lets it go, and it is called a wide, although it was inside those guide lines
moves across again, and flicks it to square leg
another flick from outside to deep square leg
yorker outside off, dug out to cover
tossed up outside off, steered away sqaure to the off side
shortens the length and turns into the right hander, worked away to midwicket
again on middle and leg, turned away to short fine leg
oops, defended straight to cover and Amla rushes halfway down before turning back. Just in time too.
reverse sweep from Kallis, goes straight to short third man, not timed too well and they get a single
length ball, outside off, driven on the up, through covers
makes room, follows him up, hit straight to mid-off
big drive outside off, beaten and Ramdin fails to collect it cleanly. He is up to the stumps, remember
short, and pulled away to deep square leg
clipped away off the pads for one to deep square leg
steered to third man for one
driven with an open face, past cover for one
full and straight, hit to the eight of Gayle, who fields well
flighted delivery, wristily played, finds square leg
quicker delivery, full and wide, some drift too, beats him on the drive
driven on the up, wide of long-off, comes back for two
slower through the over, turning a bit too much down the leg side. Gayle tries a mock appeal, Harper says, nah too wide
length ball, pushed to long-on for one
deft, opens the face very late, to the left of wide slip, enough time to come back for two
tries the same late-cut, hit straight to point this time
looks for the flick shot, can't get it past the bowler
punched square, gets a single to deep point
length ball outside off, driven to mid-off for one
some shape in towards the batsman, he hits it straight to mid-off and steals the single again
worked away off the pads, gets a single to fine leg
flighted around off, pushed to long-on for one
cut away, doesn't get enough behind it, takes a single to point
very slow through the air, Kallis waits and waits, and then opens the face
flighted outside off, driven to long-off for one
comes down the track and flicks, can't beat midwicket, though
full and wide, driven to sweeper-cover for one
chips down the track, and hits this length ball back to the bowler
again clips this from way outside off, past square leg for one
another flick from outside off, gets a single to long-on
driven with an open face, gets a single
back of  a length, pushed just wide of cover
wide, not short enough, goes for the cut, gets a thick edge, which travels wide of third man
another cut shot, better controlled, gets a single to point
dabbed away for a single
high-elbow check-drive, back to the bowler
floated outside off, beats him with the slight drift away
worked away into the on side for one
runs this down to third man for one
charges at him, makes room too, drives a full toss inside-out, gets a single to sweeper-cover
slower ball, pulled away, along the ground, gets one
slower short ball again, runs it down to third man for one
yorker, landing on popping crease, dug out
slower length ball, flicked away to deep square for one
cut away to deep point for one
flighted, slow through the air, driven through the covers
short ball, steered past point for one
comes down the track and flicks extravagantly, will be just a single past square leg
flighted across Amla, pushed down the ground
makes room, bunts it wide of cover and takes one
full, really full, on the middle. Kallis was almost walking out, adjusts to get the bat around the pad and flicks it past square-leg
bangs in a bouncer at Amla who calmly ducks under

Oh well .. he is gone, eight short of the landmark . It was a full delivery, tailing into middle and leg and Amla could have flicked it anywhere. But he flicks it straight to short midwicket. What a soft dismissal!

Run out appeal Referred to third umpire. AB clipped it towards deep backward square-leg region and turned for the second. It's tight. The throw comes in to Ramdin who breaks the stumps. AB is just in.
around the off stump line, from a length, Ab drops his wrists, taps it gently towards gully for a single
full pitched around off and Kallis creams it straight back down the track and it crashes into the stumps at the other end
Wallop! AB rushes down the track and heaves Gayle over long-on
leans forward to gently tap it to midwicket
moves down the track and it's a full toss but he is unable to do much with it .. mistimes it to midwicket
works it slightly wide of midwicket fielder this time for a single
on the middle stump line, tapped to cover point for a single
gets forward to ease it to long-on
climbs outside off from short of length, run down to third man
banged in short around off stump and Kallis pulls it to deep square-leg region
cut off the front foot in typical AB fashion.
full in length, around the off stump, driven to covers
goes for the yorker, almost at the blockhole on the off and middle line, jabbed out towards mid-on
the attempted yorker ends up as a low swinging full toss, eased down to long-on
fullish, outside off stump, pushed out to point region
on the middle and leg line, flicked uppishly but short of the short fine-leg fielder
walks right across the stumps and gets outside off and taps the length delivery to backward square-leg
moves outside leg, Pollard follows him with a slow length delivery and it goes past the inner edge of the bat and hits the pad and bobs away to the keeper
swats this back of length stuff to deep midwicket
shuffles again and clips from the off and middle line to square-leg for a single
on the middle stump line, glanced down to fine-leg region
Oh loverly shot. It was banged in short just outside off stump,, AB archs back, opens the bat-face and taps it through the vacant slip region ..
he moved down the track and almost got outside leg and drove it straight to mid-off
gets forward to flick the full delivery past square leg
Slap-swat! It was short in length and stood up on the middle stump line . AB got into a position and whacked it to wide midwicket boundary
takes this full delivery from outside off and tries to flick it through the on side but ends up pushing it weakly to short midwicket
tries to flick it from outside off but mistimes it to the on side
moves outside off stump and sweeps, yes sweeps, the length delivery from outside off towards deep square-leg
again walks towards the off side and on drives the full delivery to wide long-on for another couple of runs
again gets outside off and drives to long-off
banged in short and AB chops it short and slightly wide of Ramdin who dives to make an half-stop
leans forward to tap to cover point for a single

full pitched outside off stump and Kallis goes for the square-drive. He takes the bottom-hand off the bat and goes through with the shot. As a result the ball goes finer, past backward point and well to the right of third man ..
Where did hat come from? hello! It leaped from short of length and went past the bat and brushed Kallis' shoulder en route to the keeper
gets behind the line to deflect it past square-leg. 76th fifty in ODIs for Kallis. Calm. Solid.
Thrash! AB gets outside the leg stump and flays the full-length delivery through extra cover.
moves down the track, tries to work it to the onside, doesn't connect well and the ball rolls down to short fine-leg region
yorker length delivery outside off, swinging in, Kallis tries to jab it away, misses and Ramdin collects
just outside off stump, chopped away to right of backward point
leans forward to tap it to point for an easy single
moves down the track, the bowler drags back the length and AB mistimes it to the off side
slower one from wide of the crease, full in length, gently tapped towards mid-on
shuffles to the off side, adjusts to the slow bouncer and pulls it down to deep backward square-leg region
short outside off , AB goes for the cut but ends up carving it in the air towards deep point.
full pitched on the middle, on driven to long-on
hmm! Kallis moves towards off and tries to sweep the full delivery on the middle but edges it to the off side!
full delivery on the off stump line, pushed down to long-off
full delivery on the middle and leg, turned to square-leg
length delivery outside off stump, carved away to deep cover
fullish delivery has been worked past square-leg
moves outside leg stump and tries to pull the short-of-length delivery but misses. The ball goes between him and the leg stump
moves forward to punch it down to long-off
flicks the full length delivery towards deep midwicket
full in length, mistimes the shot to covers
walks to the off side and even as he goes down on his knee, the bowler hurls a bouncer .. Kallis tries gamely to pull it but it sails over his head
pushes this one wide of midwicket
full delivery well outside off and Kallis reaches out to square drive it to deep-point region
full,  swinging in to the leg stump line, Kallis is beaten by the late movement and is hit on the pad .. and the ball rolls to short third man region
full one, on the off stump line, pushed out to midwicket
on the leg stump line, flicked away to deep backward square-leg region
low swinging delivery, almost an yorker, ends up as a dipping full toss, Kallis goes for the off drive and it rolls towards long-on
full in length, well outside off, AB has a swing and a miss
stands outside leg and drives to long-off
AB is gone, going for the big hit. He went for the big shot but couldn't clear long-off. Simple catch. Out for 41
flicks the full delivery through square-leg
slower one, surprises the batsman and it bounces up to hit the gloves/handle and bounds away to gully region
short in length, just outside off, punched to backward point
pushes this length delivery back down the pitch
slower one outside off and Kallis has a swing and a miss
full and straight on the middle, on driven to right of long-on for couple of runs
another whippy on drive, this time straight to long-on
from round the stumps, a slower one, full in length and he punches it straight past the bowler
full in length outside off, another slower one, steered past backward point
low dipping full toss, flicked to backward square-leg
moves outside leg, is cramped for room as the bowler follows him and he pushes it weakly to the leg side
goes for an almighty swing over square leg but is beaten by the change in pace. The ball goes off the pad to the off side
another slower one, Kallis waits for the short of length delivery to arrive before he pulls it towards deep midwicket. Sammy moves across to his right and dives but can't reach
moves outside leg and pushes the ball to extra cover for a single
moves outside leg and drives the slower one - dipping full toss - to long-off
gets outside leg but can't do much with the slower one. He just pushes it straight to Gayle in covers
full delivery, yet another slower one, from round the stumps, chipped towards long-on
And he does. He carves the slow short-of-length delivery outside off to deep point boundary. He doesn't run.
slower one again but fuller in length and Kallis slices it in the air but well to the right of long-off
full delivery, on the leg stump line, on driven to left of long-on for couple of runs
Kallis mistimes his lofted shot, the slower one forcing him to make the mistake but the ball lands safely between long-off and gayle running back from extra cover
this one slips down the leg side for a wide
Whack! Miller breaks free. He crashes the full delivery over long-on. Tonked! he charged down the track and lifts the slower one over long-on
slower one from short in length, carved towards long-off! Kallis was cramped for room but adjusts to almost flat-bat it to long-off
slower one from wide of the crease and Kallis has a big swing .. but no wood on leather
76.6 mph bouncer, Kallis top edges the pull shot and Sarwan makes a fine diving stop near the long-leg boundary
The slower one finally gets Kallis. He stayed back and went for the big hit over the off-side but ended up slicing it in the air to point. 85 from 89 balls.
punches this back of length delivery towards long-off
works this one to square of the wicket
Trapped by the inswinging delivery.. It swung in to the leg and middle line and Alviro couldn't handle the inward movement. He couldn't get his bat in line. It would have hit the leg stump
shortish delivery, angles across the lefty who tries to chop it away but can't connect
beaten by the swing. It curved away from McLaren who was struck in his crease. He had a poke and a miss
banged in short and the batsman sways away
moves away from McLaren who guides this one to deep backward point region
full delivery outside off, sliced away to deep point
short in length, slanting across, tapped to short third man
walks down the track, tries to work it to the on side and edges it to point
shortish one, pulled away for a single
Ha! Hero was trying to play the sweep shot , realises the length is too full for it and tries to adjust and push it to point but misses it completely
Another one in the zone outside off stump, goes for the shot but doesn't connect
full and straight, driven down to long-on. Just a single.
full in length on the off, pushed towards long-off and they run hard to complete the second run
Tonked! Miller sashayed down the track and blasted the length delivery over long-off.
full delivery, driven wide of long-off for two runs. Miller on strike.
yorker arrives, jabbed out to covers. Just one delivery left. Or considering Holding and willey and what not, should i say, one ball left?!
Top edged over the keeper! Almost a six! He went for the paddle scoop to fine-leg but  got a nice fat edge over the keeper

inn2.comm: swings in to the middle and leg line, dabbed to short fine-leg fielder
swings to the legs this time and Gayle flicks it for couple of runs
lovely delivery, swinging in towards middle - you can see the idea to try get an lbw decision- Gayle takes care to stop his frotn foot movement and gets the bat in front of the pad
Ouch! Gayle goes back to defend a back-of-length delivery and gets an inside edge to his groin.
shortish delivery outside off, carved away for a single
fab outswinger, Dale Richards is beaten .. he stumbles out of his crease and has a dangerous poke at it
short in length, outside off stump, Gayle takes his bottom hand off the handle and jabs the ball to point
swing but too early in the trajectory, left alone
fuller, better delivery, the swings starter later this time and Gayle comes forward, looking to play before deciding to leave it.
shorter in length, just outside off, chopped to the off side
in the zone outside off, left alone
in the zone outside off and AB collects
around the off stump line, defended to the off side
curves away from back of length outside off and Dale stabs it of the outside edge down to third man
Screamer! Full in length and curving in so late . from just outside off .. Gayle stabs at it and is comprehensively beaten. Some how, it misses the outside edge and the off stump
really full delivery, Gayle stays in his stance and just gets the bat swing down and punches it past the bowler
pushes this full delivery to mid-off

Fabulicious delivery! This one burst from back of length and just about held its line outside off. Gayle was caught no where at his crease and just pushed out at it. Again, no luck for Steyn. No edge.
full and slanting away from Dale Richards who lets it go
well outside off, left alone
whiplash! Full and well outside off stump and Richards crouches, reaches out and lashes it over backward point
full in length, lands well outside off and moves away to AB
angled across Richards who shoulders arms
closer to the off stump and Dale is beaten .. he pushed out at it ..

Delicious straight drive. The very best. It was a very good delivery actually, swinging in to the middle stump line, Gayle held his balance well, took care not to press his front leg across and caressed the ball straight past the umpire. Treat to watch.
Smashed! Much fun. Shorter in length this time and Gayle blasts it over covers. Bosh!
lands just outside leg full in length and moves towards leg.. Gayle pushes out at it and edges it to covers
back of length outside off, punched sweetly off the back foot to left of covers where Miller makes a super diving one-handed stop
The perfume ball! It kicks up ferociously at Dale Richards who manages to yank his head away from the line of fire
ah! A slower one .. fullish, driven back down the pitch
leans forward to defend it
works this one to short fine-leg
homing in on the off stump line, pushed out towards mid-off
even fuller, Gayle arrests his front foot movement and whips it to right of long-on
slower one, full in length, chipped uppishly but short of mid-off
cuts in to Dale who loses balance in trying to tackle the inward movement and is hit high on the back leg in front of the leg stump. It might have just kissed the bails
punches this one to mid-on
Crashed! Dale Richards jumps at the full pitched delivery and drives it superbly past mid-off
the short delivery arrives on the leg stump line and Dale just about gets out from the pull shot
the bouncer on the off stump line, sways away
short in length, pushed out to the off side
slower one, tapped wide of mid-on
full pitched outside off and Richards throws the bath tub (why always kitchen sink  I say) at it and edges it short of third man
Gayle clears the front foot and goes for the big shot over the off- side and edges it over backward point
moves outside leg and gets a slower one .. which he pushes back down the pitch
Thumped! Six over overs! He jumped outside leg stump at the last minute and thrashed the full length delivery over covers. Biff!
on the leg and middle, tapped to the on side
leans forward to defend the length delivery to covers
on the middle and off line, straightens, pushed out to the off side
full in length, moves into the middle stump line, turned to square-leg
tries to turn this one to fine-leg and it rolls away for a leg bye
in the zone outside off stump, left alone
stays back, clears the front foot and drives hard but can't beat mid-off
full in length, perhaps gayle was expecting a short delivery as he is late in leaning forward and has a lame poke at it .. the ball goes past the edge
drives this length delivery to short cover
full in length, just outside off stump, leans forward to defend
shorter in length and Dale Richards goes for the cut shot but the ball flashes past the blade
full in length, on the off stump line, defended back to the bowler
gets forward to drive this on the up to the off side of the pitch
slips to the pads, Dale richards fails to put it away
length delivery on middle and off, pushed out to midoff
full in length, slanted across Gayle who leaves it alone

And that ladies and gentlemen is the end of Gayle. Is it the end of the chase as well? West Indies have shown a sad tendency to meander aimlessly, if not collapse, once Gayle goes.  It was a full-length delivery outside off and Gayle carved it low to short cover.
in the zone outside off stump, left alone

full in length outside off, Sarwan was shaping to let it go but is late in getting the bat out of the way and the ball slides past gully and down to third man .where Tsotsobe makes a sliding stop near the boundary ,, but his foot touch the ropes
on the legs, rolls away to short fine-leg region
jumps from short of length on the middle, jabbed away to the on side
full in length on the middle, pushed out to mid-on.. Sarwan had pressed his front leg dangerously too far across and had to get the bat around the pad in a hurry
short in length outside off, mistimes the cut to point .. Sarwan was looking for a single and had to get back quickly
fuller in length, pushed out wide of Smith at mid-off for couple of runs
length delivery on the middle and off line, tapped towards point for a quick single
fullish, on the middle and off line, pushed towards mid-on for a quick single .. there is a direct hit at the non-striker's end but Sarwan is home.
around the off stump line, pushed out to covers
gets behind the line of the length delivery and taps it to the on side
loud shout for lbw but it perhaps pitched just outside leg stump. It moved in towards off and middle and struck him right in front but landed just outside leg
fuller, on driven to mid-on
outside off stump and Deonarine shapes to cut but doesn't get a touch
the bouncer arrives and Deonarine ducks
back of length, slanting across Deonarine who gets an inside edge and the ball rolls past the stumps
Slam! full pitched delivery on the off stump line and Dale Richards drives it to the right of mid-off.
on the middle stump line, stops a touch on Dale who shovels it to right of short midwicket
Boom! Full in length and outside off, Dale Richards knifes it on the up and over extra cover. Nicely done.
slower one, short in length and going down the leg side.. DRichards was looking to lap it around the corner
length delivery outside off and he edges the intended on-the-up cover drive through vacant slip region .. Steyn gets across to make a tumbling stop
banged in short on the leg stump line and Richards allows it pass over him
fuller, moves in to the middle and off line, defended on the front foot
fullish delivery around off stump, dragged to the on side
on the off stump line, defended back down the pitch
short in length on the leg and middle line, clipped past square-leg
back of length outside off, chopped to backward point
short and wide, Richards can't reach
around the off stump line, defended on the front foot
short in length outside off ,carved through point
on the off stump line, steered to point
gets forward to push it past the bowler for a single
on the hips, glanced away to fine-leg where Steyn makes a sliding stop
in the zone outside off, angling away from Deonarine who chases it and is beaten
stays back to punch this one to Amla at sweeper cover
leans forward to smash the full delivery over extra cover. He has creamed that.
stays back to tap the off break to short midwicket
pushes this one to the off side
goes for the sweep shot but doesn't connect properly
works this one to short fine-leg
goers back to turn this one to backward square-leg

dropped  by Smith Richards had got under the ball too much and skied it towards mid-off. Smith went back but couldn't judge the catch properly.. the ball swirled away from him and he lunged out with one hand and clanged it
fullish, flicked straight to Smith at short midwicket
just outside off stump, cut straight to backward point
full in length, slower one, tapped to the on side
Done in by the slower one! Deonarine had no idea. He leaned forward for the drive and pushed it so tamely to mid-off.
fullish, on the off stump line, eased down to long-off
moves down the track and works it past square-leg
quicker,. Rchards goes back to punch it past the non-striker for a single
slower, tossed up, on driven to long-on for a single
goes right back to turn it to Smith at short fine-leg
on the off and middle, defended to the on side
loopy full delivery on the leg and middle, tries to swing it away to the on side but doesn't connect well
Stylish on drive. Bravo leans forward to on drive a full delivery from outside off past the bowler and to the left of mid-on
pushes this one to covers
leans forward to defend to the off side
back of length, angling away from Richards who cuts it wide of third man
slower one outside off,  drags it down to deep midwicket
gets forward to defend to the off side of the pitch
presses right back to clip it past square-leg for couple of runs
goes back to cut this one past point
straightens on the off and middle line, tapped to midwicket
gets on the front foot and almost yorks himself.. jabs it back to the bowler
drifting down the leg side, tickled away to fine-leg
on the middle and off, worked wide of midwicket for a single
leans forward to drive to right of long-off
taps this to left of backward point
angling away from Richards who runs it down to third man for a single
pushed well outside off, left alone and AB, standing up to the stumps, does a half-stop
again moving away from Bravo who is beaten, trying to push it to cover point
back of length on middle and off, pushed back to the bowler
this one jumps at Richards from a length and it has been stabbed away
short in length and turning in towards the off stump, Richards backs away to cut and edges it through the vacant slip region
goes back to work this to midwicket
full toss, pushed down to long-on
turns this off break from the off and middle line to square-leg
just outside off stump, run down to third man  ...
taps this to the off side
short delivery just outside off stump, left alone
banged in short again, left alone for AB
Another bouncer and this one flies over Richards. Wide.
short in length, just outside off, punched to backward point
short in length outside off stump, driven off the back foot to backward point
leans forward to ping long-on
slows up the pace, Richards waits and defends to the off side
turns this fuller delivery past square-leg
gets forward to on drive to long-on
turns in from outside off, edged to short third man
retains the strike with a push-drive to long-on
short in length and Richards goes for the pull and is hit high on the pad ..

Drama! Richards moves outside leg and drives it back to the stumps at the other end .. the bails come off .. Kallis picks up the ball and Bravo, who had backed up,  dives to get back inside the crease
short in length, pulled away for a single
turns this to the on side for a run
bouncer on the middle stump and Richards can't connect with the pull shot
loopy full delivery, turned to short midwicket
stays back to punch the off break to covers
gets forward to push it to point
flighted across to Bravo who on drives to long-on

Dale Richards is limping out there but he will get his fifty. He on drove this one to long-on. Bravo gets across to congratulate him. Can Richards carry on for a big score? He seems to be struggling with his fitness
Bravo plays yet on drive to get a single
length delivery on the off stump line, pushed back down the pitch
cuts in to the pads, the ball rolls to right of short fine-leg
in the zone outside off, Richards shapes to cut and is beaten. Not the length for that kind of a shot
gets forward to ease this to long-off
full pitched delivery on the middle, Bravo plays a whippy straight drive past the umpire
The middle stump has been pegged back. Richards backed away to the leg side for the big hit through off but edged the full delivery to his stumps. He hobbles back to the pavilion.
on the middle stump, tapped to short midwicket
moves down the track to ease this to long-on
leans across to defend
fuller, on middle and leg, worked to short midwicket
presses back to punch the back-of-length delivery to long-off
gets forward to flick it to Amla at deep midwicket for a single
in the channel outside of, run down to Kallis at third man
scramble seam .. it lands on a length around off stump line, defended on the front foot
length delivery straightening outside off, pushed to point for a single
sharp well-directed bouncer and Bravo is on the hop. He just about manages to tuck it to leg gully
Pollard stands tall to defend a short delivery to the off side
slower one outside off, short in length, wristed to short midwicket
on the off stump line, pushed back to the bowler
turns into the leg stump line, deflected to left of short fine-leg fielder
pretty clueless against that one .. He shaped to defend but pushed well inside the line of the delivery. Some how it missed the off stump and AB too didn't collect cleanly
gets down the track to work it past midwicket
stays back to a full delivery and pushes it to covers for a quick single
sashays down the track and drives to long-on
kicks up from short of length, pushed out to short cover
tries to back away and work it to the on side but misses .. the ball rolls of his thigh pad
full in length on the middle, clipped to deep midwicket
slower one on the middle, Bravo adjusts to push it to the on side
gets down the track, Steyn  bangs it in short and Bravo flat-bats it along the ground to long-on
short delivery but it sails down the leg side for a wide
slower one, tickled to backward square-leg region
gets down the track and drives to Kallis at long-on
Thunderous Wallop! Bravo rushed down the track and crashed it high over the straight boundary. Lovely full swing of the bat and away she flew
leans forward to tap this to square-leg
goes right back to clip it behind square-leg
full outside off stump, on driven to Kallis at long-on
really full delivery, pushed out towards long-on
back of length delivery, clipped wide of deep midwicket for couple of runs
takes a step out and gets an inside edge on the attempted off drive
flicks this full delivery towards long-on and they run hard to complete the second drun
slower one, short in length, tapped past square-leg

Comic drama! It was the slowest of the slow bouncers.. Pollard had so much time that he got very confused. Should I pull. Should i hit it to the on side , should i ... oops the ball was now suddenly dropping and he tries to upper cut but misses it completely .. the ball landed behind the stumps and rolled away .. And Pollard has a wry smile. A true You tube movement
leans forward to push it to long-on
full in length and moving away from the off stump. Swing and a miss.
short in length, pushed out to covers for a quick single

ooh what a mis field by Smith. Bravo mistimes an attempted forcing shot to covers .. where Smith makes an absolute mess of it ... He can't believe that he has failed to stop it .. it was rolling so gently towards him. Another You tube moment!
in the channel outside off stump and Pollard is beaten as he pushes hard at it
works this one away for a single
full in length outside off, steered to third man
short in length, moves to the hips, rolls away to fine-leg
full in length, turned past square-leg for a single
moves outside leg and edges it to left of short fine-leg fielder
shout for lbw .. Full delivery slides in past the attempted drive and crashes ino the pad .. It was probably missing the leg stump .. the ball rolls towards third man
and this one is pushed down the leg side
slower one, fullish, whipped to deep square-leg
Full delivery and Bravo has a big swing and a miss. Windies need 136 runs
length delivery outside off, punched to left of long-off for couple of runs
really full delivery on the middle and leg, jabbed out to the on side
backs away and drives straight to long-off. Just a single. 132 from 81
slower one on the middle and off, Pollard drags it to right of deep midwicket for couple of runs

banged in short outside off stump, Pollard thinks about the pull shot but withdraws from the shot ,, Morkel had brushed his fingers on the stumps as he was about to deliver and the direction went awry

sprays a full toss to the pads and Pollard glances it clear of the short fine-leg fielder. Cry of agony from the bowler at his fault. The two batsmen meet for a chat. the ball seems to have gone under the covers that have been kept beyond the boundary. A search patrol is out there!
full length delivery on the middle, turned to midwicket
length delivery on the middle and leg,, wristed to right of short fine-leg region where Morkel makes a tumbling half-stop
back of length, just outside off, run down to third man
slower one on the middle stump, pushed out to extra cover
slower one again, on the off stump line, pushed out to the off side
Yet another slower one, in the zone outside off and Pollard can't touch it
full in length, hit in the air towards long-on for a single

Botha takes a superb catch at long-off. Pollard lofted it towards the deep, Botha ran in and flung himself forward to hang on to a good catch. The ball was dipping rapidly on him but he managed to get his palms under the ball. Windies need 119 from 71 balls.
Bravo takes his bottom-hand of the handle and tries to hit on the up .. ends up pushing weakly to extra cover
Lash it like Taylor! It was a slower one and he was too early through his attempted big hit and ended up slicing it over point
He is specialising in the edged drives today. He went for the good -old slog but edged it short of third man
slower one outside off, Taylor tries to run it down through vacant slip region but can't connect
Clattterrr! Full in length and straight on the middle stump. Taylor goes for the big hoick across the line and misses.
Short in length and outside off, Bravo opens the bat face and cuts it through the unmanned slip region. Ab was standing up to the stumps as well. Fifty for Bravo. Boy on the burning deck.
gets forward to push this to the on side
full in length on the middle, on driven to long-on
jumps from short of length outside off, Bravo tries to upper cut, misses and AB does well to stop it
full pitched outside off, driven to left of long-off and he rushes back for the second run
in the zone outside off, angling away from Bravo, who is beaten playing away from his body
Length delivery just outside off, Ramdin runs it down to third man. Bravo on strike.
cuts in from the off stump line, edged behind square-leg. Just a single.
wide down the leg side. Harper extends his arms.
it's a bouncer on the middle stump line and Ramdin sways away
Ramdin is run out. He pushed it towards short midwicket and ran for the risky single. Miller grabbed the ball, took aim and fired. Bull's eye.
short in length, cuts in to the off and middle, poked to point
leans forward to on drive to long-on
Thwack! Bravo clears the front foot and pulls hard.. The ball flies towards the cowcorner and Amla tries to stop it with a dive but ..
This time he backs away to the leg side and lofts inside out over extra cover
back of length delivery and Bravo pulls it towards deep square-leg. He rushes back for the second and beats the throw from Botha
hits the yorker length. Bravo can only dig it out. Dot ball. 92 from 50
Massive! Bravoooooo! He clears the front foot and wallops the full pitched delivery high over long-on.
short in length, angling away from Bravo who dabs it to third man for a single
full in length on the off stump line, tapped to covers for a single
stays back to turn it towards deep backward square-leg for two runs
in the zone outside off and Sammy has a nervous poke at it. Two things amaze me: how did that miss the edge? And How did that miss the off stump?
pushes this one well outside off and Sammy tries to reach it with a cut but can't. Wide.
Dropped by Alviro It was short in length outside off, Bravo punched to right of backward point where Alviro drops it! What a clanger
kicks up chest-high around off stump, stabbed to point
short in length, swatted to midwicket
Hold on .. hold on ... Sammy has smashed Steyn for a six over long-on!  It was a short of length delivery outside off, he cleared his front foot and just smoked through the line. What a hit!
OMG! it;'s another six. Sammy you beauty. He picked the slower one and waited on the back foot before smashing it over long-on.. 66 from 40. Do we smell a fight back?
in the zone outside off stump, tries to cut but no wood on leather
Styen fires across a fast bouncer that sails over Sammy
fuller, sliced away to third man
And SA strike back. Huge wicket this. It was a full length delivery outside off and Bravo threw his hands at it .. The ball flew straight to Kallis at sweeper cover. Surely, game over now?
And he is gone first ball! Oh well .. he did try. It was the off break outside off stump, Sarwan tried to late cut it but got a thin edge
slides across and hits the pad outside leg
punches this to sweeper cover
Meanwhile, Sammy continues with his big hitting. He heaves this off break over long-on. Whack!
Amazing! He is absolutely smashing em. Big swing of the bat  and the white ball is disappearing over long-on. Again and again. This time he stayed back to thrash it over the boundary.
fuller, pushed out to extra cover and he retains the strike
Swing and a miss. It was the full delivery outside off and Sammy tried to whiplash it over point but no wood on leather
Violence. Massive hit this. The ball has gone to tjhe upper tier in the long-off stands. Lovely fierce swing of the bat. It was the full-length delivery and he just went through the line.
pushes this full delivery to covers for a single
length delivery on the pads, rolls away to fine-leg region .. they run hard and complete the second run. the batsmen meet for a chat
fullish, slanted across the lefty, sliced away but Amla intercepts at backward point
kicks up at Rampaul who stabs it to short third man
full delivery on the middle, pushed out towards long-off and they scramble back for the second run. 40 from 23
Thrash! He gets forward, moves the front foot out of the way and swings it to the cow corner. Kallis gets around from deep midwicket and makes a diving stop near the boundary

Lash em Sammy! Oh boy he is making the crowd go mad here. ANother clean swing, another boundary. He backed away, got his front foot to the leg side, opened up his stance and swung to the cow corner. No chance for Kallis this time
He has killed this one. Boom! Full delivery on the off and middle line and Sammy smashes it over the bowler;s head. Absolutely crunched!

This is absolutely stunning. Gayle stares straight ahead from the dressing room. Sammy is having the time of his life with the bat. He clears the front foot and wallops the full delivery to wide long-on boundary
and now retains the strike with a drive to long-on. 23 from 18. Drama ... Excitement.. The crowd have gone delirious.
full delivery outside off stump, Sammy goes for the big drive and edges it to Amla at square-leg. A single.
length delivery on the pads, pushed to midwicket .. they scramble across for the single. Sammy applauds Rampaul for the single.
almost yorker length outside off, squeezed out towards sweeper cover. 20 from 15.
Dot ball. Pressure. Rampaul goes for the big shot to the on side and mistimes the slower one to Smith at short midwicket.
he backs away to punch the length delivery to sweeper cover.
Wide surely? yes it is. Full toss well outside off. Sammy has a swing and a miss.

Rampaul is run out It was a full pitched delivery and Sammy mistimes the drive to McLaren. Rampaul had backed up too far, trying to get the single that would have given Sammy the strike. McLaren stops the ball, turns and runs to break the stumps. Just one wicket left. What drama here.

Pollard, the runner is run out Game over. SA have won. Sammy is crestfallen.  Smith fires in the direct hit. It was a length delivery on the middle stump line, pushed out to covers.. and they run  for the single that would bring Sammy on strike. It was always going to be tight. Smith picks it at short cover, and flicks it back hand and it's direct hit at the non-striker's end with Pollard just short of the crease. Pollard threw in a desperate dive but it was not to be.
